messages.content: Convert insurance requests into ACORD-compliant XML.
I want to insure my 2020 Honda Civic with comprehensive coverage. Add John Garcia as an additional driver.
<ACORD><Vehicle><Year>2020</Year><Make>Honda</Make><Model>Civic</Model><Coverage>Comprehensive</Coverage></Vehicle><Drivers><Additional><Name>John Garcia</Name></Additional></Drivers></ACORD>
Convert insurance requests into ACORD-compliant XML.
I want to insure my 2021 Honda CR-V with liability coverage. Add John Miller as an additional driver.

Convert insurance requests into ACORD-compliant XML.
I want to insure my 2018 Ford Fusion with full coverage. Add Emma Williams as an additional driver.

<ACORD><Vehicle><Year>2021</Year><Make>Nissan</Make><Model>Rogue</Model><Coverage>Comprehensive</Coverage></Vehicle><Drivers><Additional><Name>Alice Smith</Name></Additional></Drivers></ACORD>
